long_description: Send the tassle on top of the warm SmartWool Straightline hat flying as you cruise down cross-country ski trails on a winter's day. Single-layer, jersey-knit construction of merino wool and acrylic is soft and warm; interior merino wool headband is comfortable next to skin. Part of the SmartWool performance hats collection, the Straightline hat has the SmartWool Warm rating (out of Warm, Warmer or Warmest).
short_description: Send the tassle on top of the warm SmartWool Straightline hat flying as you cruise down cross-country ski trails on a winter's day.
